::Lavatron/Galactors/Autofire::

The laser hit Lavatron, making him step back. He growls.

"Allright," he says, firing lifting his right arm and firing two
lightning bolts, one at Surgital's chest and the other at Surgital's
head.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
One of the shots hits Autofire's engine, denting the metal but not
tearing through. He fires two laser bolts down at Composer, and then
feels two missiles smash into his sides. He growls, firing blindly
behind him with a few laser bolts.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Three gestalts so far.  Well, I'm not sure, is Abominus ready
yet?
> ::Composer/Surgital/Cutthroat::
> 
>     The net on Composer deteriorates, and then Composer jumps onto
his feet.
> 
>     "Thanks, Wheeljack.  Let's get those little Decepticreeps!"
Composer said, then flew up into the air, and fired 4 shots from his
plasma rifle at Autofire.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>      Surgital stomped the ground in anger when his saw blade missed
the Galactor jets.  And then, Surgital saw a bot he wanted to
challenge.  Surgital wanted a gestalt to gestalt.
> 
>      "Me and you punk!" Surgital yelled at a gestalt missing a left
arm.
> 
>      Surgital's left hand converted into a laser.  He shot it down
at the runt that was Tantrum to get out of the fight he was hoping to
start with the lightning using gestalt.  Then, after firing the laser,
Surgital shot another laser at Lavatron's side.
